name: Mattermost Semantic Search
description: A plugin to search mattermost messages semantically

settings_schema.header: Configure your Mattermost Semantic Search Plugin
settings_schema.footer: To report an issue, make a suggestion or a contribution, [plugin](https://github.com/iCog-Labs-Dev/mm-semantic-search).

settings.help_text: Number of hours or minutes to wait before fetching new messages. Minimum is 1 minute, maximum is (24 hours). Default is 15 minutes.
Toggle the semantic search sync. If enabled, the plugin will fetch new messages every 'fetch interval'. If disabled, the plugin will not fetch new messages. Default is false.
